I hate “Crank dat” song, does my head in, and when someone uses it as a ringtone I feel like ripping out there throat.

So no I don’t like him.

if you dont like him why have you got the username ‘soulja’?

The word “soulja” doesn’t mean it is related to Soulja Boy

although you do not spell solider like that and it just so happens that there is an artist called ‘Soulja Boy’ and he started the topic.
[/quote]
First of all, lots of rappers spell it like that second , he didnt start the topic.
Maybe if you weren’t too lazy to scroll up you wouldn’t have to embarras yourself.[/quote]

item.title: Hate Soljah Boy?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:11, topic:190224”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=253269.msg2116464#msg2116464 date=1205801207]
I don’t hate him.

Little more than a year ago, he was my favorite rapper.

Then Crank Dat Soulja Boy came along.
Everyone turned into adoring fans.
Now I cringe at that song.
You just don’t get the same feeling listening to him anymore, ESPECIALLY around other people.
[/quote]
I hate when that sort of stuff happens, take for instance My Chemical Romance. They were pretty good and one of my favourite bands, then they brought out “The Black Parade” and then everybody wanted to listen to them and every chav had “When i was, a young boy” playing on there phones.

/end faggot speech[/quote]

dude black parade is a kickass song

Read full topic
